Title: Pilot
Plot: Sex, drugs and classical music illustrate what happens behind the curtains at the symphony can be just as captivating as what occurs on stage. Brash new maestro Rodrigo (Gael Garcia Bernal) is stirring things up, and young oboist Hailey (Lola Kirke) hopes for her big chance.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Writer: Roman Coppola, Jason Schwartzman, Alex Timbers
